name: Fix or Fry
description:
Based on the idea behind Sort or 'Splode from the Mario minigames.

Musi: Pixel Perfect by PlayKoru support the creator here! - http://playkoru.com/en/home/

May be updated from time to time to address changes that you, the player may request. If you have any suggestions or any found bugs please email them to me with the subject "Fix or Fry Suggestion" at riptidestudios@icloud.com or tweet me @riptide_studios !
